analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol:
	Contract EtheeraToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#229-230)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in EtheeraCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#393-448):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(wallet,beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#438-441)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens_sold (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#445-448)

EtheeraCrowdsale.withdrawTokensForEtheeraTeam has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(wallet,whereToSendTokens[i],tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#549)

EtheeraCrowdsale.withdrawTokensForEtheeraTeam has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(wallet,whereToSendTokens[i],tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#564-566)

	- token.mint(wallet,whereToSendTokens[i],tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#591-594)

EtheeraCrowdsale.withdrawTokensForEtheeraTeam has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(wallet,whereToSendTokens[i],tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol)

Reentrancy in EtheeraCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#393-448):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(wallet,beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#438-441)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- usersThatBoughtETA (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#442-443)

EtheeraCrowdsale.hardCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#284)
EtheeraCrowdsale.maxTokensForSale should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#288-289)
EtheeraCrowdsale.ratePerWei should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#269)
EtheeraCrowdsale.softCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x6b7470bfa67566df5275365933f5984530f54a7a.sol#282)
